quote: Health is the greatest gift, contentment the greatest wealth, faithfulness the best relationship.
name: Buddha

quote: Calm mind brings inner strength and self-confidence, so that's very important for good health.
name: Dalai Lama

quote: The first wealth is health.
name: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: Good health and good sense are two of life's greatest blessings.
name: Publilius Syrus

quote: I believe that the greatest gift you can give your family and the world is a healthy you.
name: Joyce Meyer

quote: To enjoy the glow of good health, you must exercise.
name: Gene Tunney

quote: It is health that is real wealth and not pieces of gold and silver.
name: Mahatma Gandhi

quote: A healthy attitude is contagious but don't wait to catch it from others. Be a carrier.
name: Tom Stoppard

quote: Early to bed and early to rise makes a man healthy, wealthy and wise.
name: Benjamin Franklin

quote: Rest when you're weary. Refresh and renew yourself, your body, your mind, your spirit. Then get back to work.
name: Ralph Marston

quote: Health is not valued till sickness comes.
name: Thomas Fuller

quote: There's nothing more important than our good health - that's our principal capital asset.
name: Arlen Specter

quote: Good health is not something we can buy. However, it can be an extremely valuable savings account.
name: Anne Wilson Schaef

quote: All the money in the world can't buy you back good health.
name: Reba McEntire

quote: He who has health, has hope; and he who has hope, has everything.
name: Thomas Carlyle

quote: Maintaining good health should be the primary focus of everyone.
name: Sangram Singh

quote: Without your health, you've got nothing going on. I thank God every day for good health.
name: Ric Flair

quote: You can't take good health for granted.
name: Jack Osbourne

quote: The healthy man does not torture others - generally it is the tortured who turn into torturers.
name: Carl Jung

quote: Apart from education, you need good health, and for that, you need to play sports.
name: Kapil Dev

quote: The power of community to create health is far greater than any physician, clinic or hospital.
name: Mark Hyman

quote: Health is the thing that makes you feel that now is the best time of the year.
name: Franklin Pierce Adams

quote: It's better to be healthy alone than sick with someone else.
name: Phil McGraw

quote: The health of the eye seems to demand a horizon. We are never tired, so long as we can see far enough.
name: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: Without health life is not life; it is only a state of langour and suffering - an image of death.
name: Buddha

quote: The groundwork of all happiness is health.
name: Leigh Hunt

quote: Health is the vital principle of bliss, and exercise, of health.
name: James Thomson

quote: I did not become a vegetarian for my health, I did it for the health of the chickens.
name: Isaac Bashevis Singer

quote: Be careful about reading health books. You may die of a misprint.
name: Mark Twain

quote: Eating ice cream and not exercising is great. The downside is your health isn't so good.
name: Jeff Bridges

quote: Looking after my health today gives me a better hope for tomorrow.
name: Anne Wilson Schaef

quote: In the midst of these hard times it is our good health and good sleep that are enjoyable.
name: Knute Nelson

quote: Man needs difficulties; they are necessary for health.
name: Carl Jung

quote: You're in pretty good shape for the shape you are in.
name: Dr. Seuss

quote: A healthy outside starts from the inside.
name: Robert Urich

quote: My body is like breakfast, lunch, and dinner. I don't think about it, I just have it.
name: Arnold Schwarzenegger
